add_namespace = gas_unit_leader_events

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.0
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.0.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.0.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^0 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.0
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.32
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.32.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.32.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^32 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.32
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    id = gas_unit_leader_events.64
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.64.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.64.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^64 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.64
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    id = gas_unit_leader_events.96
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.96.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.96.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^96 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.96
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.128
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.128.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.128.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^128 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.128
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.160
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.160.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.160.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^160 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.160
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.192
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.192.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.192.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^192 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.192
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.224
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.224.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.224.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^224 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.224
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.256
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.256.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.256.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^256 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.256
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.288
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.288.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.288.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^288 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.288
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.320
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.320.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.320.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^320 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.320
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.352
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.352.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.352.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^352 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.352
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.384
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.384.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.384.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^384 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.384
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.416
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.416.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.416.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^416 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.416
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.448
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.448.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.448.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^448 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.448
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.480
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.480.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.480.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^480 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.480
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.512
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.512.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.512.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^512 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.512
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    id = gas_unit_leader_events.544
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.544.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.544.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^544 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.544
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    id = gas_unit_leader_events.576
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.576.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.576.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^576 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.576
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.608.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^608 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array

                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.608
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }

    hidden = yes

                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.640
                    hours = 2
                }
            }

    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.672.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes

        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^672 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader

                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.672
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }

    id = gas_unit_leader_events.704
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.704.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.704.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^704 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.704
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes

    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^863 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.863
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }

    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.895.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^895 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.895
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = {

    id = gas_unit_leader_events.990
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.990.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.990.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^990 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.990
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1053 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1053
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1147 } #a simple workaround

                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1147

                }

    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1210 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1210
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1304 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1304
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    title = gas_unit_leader_events.1367.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.1367.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1367 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1367
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = {

    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1461 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1461
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes

            if = {

                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1555
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }

    title = gas_unit_leader_events.1618.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.1618.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1618 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1618
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = {

    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1712 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1712
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1806 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1806
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1900 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1900
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1995
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
unit_leader_event = { #THIS = Country
    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1996
    title = gas_unit_leader_events.1996.t
    desc = gas_unit_leader_events.1996.d
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hidden = yes
    
    immediate = {
        add_to_temp_array = { scope_array = global.army_leader_ids^1996 } #a simple workaround
        for_each_scope_loop = { #PREV = Country, THIS = Army Leader
            array = scope_array
            
            if = {
                limit = {
                    has_trait = gas_attack
                }
                gas_attack_on_provinces = yes
                unit_leader_event = { 
                    id = gas_unit_leader_events.1996
                    hours = 2
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
